keyboard.description: When focus is on an trigger of a collapsed item, the item is expanded
When focus is on an trigger of a collapsed section, expands the section.
Moves focus to the next focusable element
Moves focus to the previous focusable element
Moves focus to the next trigger
Moves focus to the previous trigger.
When focus is on an trigger, moves focus to the first trigger.
When focus is on an trigger, moves focus to the last trigger.
Increments the angle slider based on defined step
Decrements the angle slider based on defined step
Decreases the value by the step amount.
Increases the value by the step amount.
Decreases the value by a larger step
Increases the value by a larger step
Sets the value to 0 degrees.
Sets the value to 360 degrees.
Toggle the checkbox
Opens/closes the collapsible.
Opens/closes the collapsible.

When focus is on the trigger, opens the color picker
When focus is on a trigger of a swatch, selects the color (and closes the color picker)
When focus is on the input or channel inputs, selects the color

When focus is on the color area, decreases the hue value of the color
When focus is on the channel sliders, decreases the value of the channel

When focus is on the color area, increases the hue value of the color
When focus is on the channel sliders, increases the value of the channel

When focus is on the color area, increases the saturation value of the color
When focus is on the channel sliders, increases the value of the channel

When focus is on the color area, decreases the saturation value of the color
When focus is on the channel sliders, decreases the value of the channel
Closes the color picker and moves focus to the trigger
Activates/Selects the highlighted item
Activates/Selects the highlighted item
Highlights the next item in the menu
Highlights the previous item in the menu
When focus is on trigger, opens or closes the submenu depending on reading direction.
Closes the menu and moves focus to the trigger
Opens/closes the nested menu.
Opens/closes the nested menu.
Moves focus to the next item.
Moves focus to the previous item.
Opens the nested menu.
Closes the nested menu.
Closes the nested menu and moves focus to the parent menu item.
Moves focus to the previous input
Moves focus to the next input
Deletes the value in the current input and moves focus to the previous input
Deletes the value in the current input
Pastes the value into the input fields
Opens/closes the popover.
Opens/closes the popover.

Moves focus to the next focusable element within the content.
Note: If there are no focusable elements, focus is moved to the next focusable element after the trigger.

Moves focus to the previous focusable element within the content
Note: If there are no focusable elements, focus is moved to the trigger.
Closes the popover and moves focus to the trigger.
Opens/closes the tooltip without delay.
If open, closes the tooltip without delay.

When focus is on trigger, opens the select and focuses the first selected item.
When focus is on the content, selects the highlighted item.

When focus is on trigger, opens the select and focuses the first selected item.
When focus is on content, selects the focused item.

When focus is on trigger, opens the select.
When focus is on content, moves focus to the next item.

When focus is on trigger, opens the select.
When focus is on content, moves focus to the previous item.
Closes the select and moves focus to trigger.

When focus is on trigger, selects the item whose label starts with the typed character.
When focus is on the listbox, moves focus to the next item with a label that starts with the typed character.
Toggle the switch
Increments the slider based on defined step
Decrements the slider based on defined step
Increases the value by the step amount.
Decreases the value by the step amount.
Increases the value by a larger step
Decreases the value by a larger step
Increases the value by a larger step
Decreases the value by a larger step
Sets the value to its minimum.
Sets the value to its maximum.
Moves focus to either the checked radio item or the first radio item in the group.
When focus is on an unchecked radio item, checks it.
Moves focus and checks the next radio item in the group.
Moves focus and checks the next radio item in the group.
Moves focus to the previous radio item in the group.
Moves focus to the previous radio item in the group.
Increments the focused thumb based on defined step
Decrements the focused thumb based on defined step
Increases the focused thumb by the step amount.
Decreases the focused thumb by the step amount.
Increases the focused thumb value by a larger step
Decreases the focused thumb value by a larger step
Increases the focused thumb value by a larger step
Decreases the focused thumb value by a larger step
Sets the focused thumb value to its minimum.
Sets the focused thumb value to its maximum.
When focus moves onto the tabs, focuses the active trigger. When a trigger is focused, moves focus to the active content.
Moves focus to the next trigger in vertical orientation and activates its associated content.
Moves focus to the next trigger in horizontal orientation and activates its associated content.
Moves focus to the previous trigger in vertical orientation and activates its associated content.
Moves focus to the previous trigger in horizontal orientation and activates its associated content.
Moves focus to the first trigger and activates its associated content.
Moves focus to the last trigger and activates its associated content.
In manual mode, when a trigger is focused, moves focus to its associated content.
Moves focus to either the pressed item or the first item in the group.
Activates/deactivates the item.
Activates/deactivates the item.
Moves focus to the next item in the group.
Moves focus to the next item in the group.
Moves focus to the previous item in the group.
Moves focus to the previous item in the group.
Moves focus to the first item.
Moves focus to the last item.
Moves focus to the previous tag item
Moves focus to the next tag item
Deletes the tag item that has visual focus or the last tag item

When a tag item has visual focus, it puts the tag in edit mode.
When the input has focus, it adds the value to the list of tags
Deletes the tag item that has visual focus
When `addOnPaste` is set. Adds the pasted value as a tags
Moves focus to the tree view, placing the first tree view item in focus.
Selects the item or branch node
Moves focus to the next node
Moves focus to the previous node

When focus is on a closed branch node, opens the branch.
When focus is on an open branch node, moves focus to the first item node.

When focus is on an open branch node, closes the node.
When focus is on an item or branch node, moves focus to its parent branch node.
Moves focus to first node without opening or closing a node.
Moves focus to the last node that can be focused without expanding any nodes that are closed.
Focus moves to the next node with a name that starts with the typed character. The search logic ignores nodes that are descendants of closed branch.
Expands all sibling nodes that are at the same depth as the focused node.
Moves focus to and toggles the selection state of the next node.
Moves focus to and toggles the selection state of the previous node.
Selects all nodes in the tree. If all nodes are selected, unselects all nodes.
Moves focus to the previous day within the current week.
Moves focus to the next day within the current week.
Moves focus to the same day of the week in the previous week.
Moves focus to the same day of the week in the next week.
Moves focus to the first day of the current month.
Moves focus to the last day of the current month.
Moves focus to the same day of the month in the previous month.
Moves focus to the same day of the month in the next month.
Selects the focused date and closes the date picker.
Closes the date picker without selecting any date.
Saves the edited content and exits edit mode.
Discards the changes and exits edit mode.
Increments the value of the number input by a predefined step.
Decrements the value of the number input by a predefined step.
Increments the value of the number input by a larger predefined step.
Decrements the value of the number input by a larger predefined step.
Sets the value of the number input to its minimum allowed value.
Sets the value of the number input to its maximum allowed value.
Submits the value entered in the number input.
Moves focus to the next star, increasing the rating value based on the `allowHalf` property.
Moves focus to the previous star, decreasing the rating value based on the `allowHalf` property.
Selects the focused star in the rating group.
Moves to the next step in the tour.
Moves to the previous step in the tour.
Closes the tour.

When the combobox is closed, opens the listbox and highlights to the first option.
When the combobox is open, moves focus to the next option.

When the combobox is closed, opens the listbox and highlights to the last option.
When the combobox is open, moves focus to the previous option.
When the combobox is open, moves focus to the first option.
When the combobox is open, moves focus to the last option.
Closes the listbox.
Selects the highlighted option and closes the combobox.
Closes the combobox
Activates/Selects the highlighted item
Activates/Selects the highlighted item
Highlights the next item in the menu
Highlights the previous item in the menu
When focus is on trigger, opens or closes the submenu depending on reading direction.
Closes the context menu
When focus is on the trigger, opens the dialog.
Moves focus to the next focusable element within the content. Focus is trapped within the dialog.
Moves focus to the previous focusable element. Focus is trapped within the dialog.
Closes the dialog and moves focus to trigger or the defined final focus element
Moves focus to the previous column.
Moves focus to the next column.
Moves focus to the previous cell within the current column.
Moves focus to the next cell within the current column.
Selects the focused hour/minute/second/period and moves focus to the next column.
Closes the time picker without selecting any time.
